org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.image

Class ImageStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.image.ImageStore

  • public class ImageStore
extends java.lang.Object
    The ImageStore is a class made up of static fields and methods that can load and store image packs to be used at a later date. When using Java2D (OpenGL = false) there is a rendering flash when rendering an image for the first time, this class can help prevent that issue. ImagePack stores image packs that can all be loaded at the same time.
    See Also:
    ImagePack
